'Брак 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса enumBoolean ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as enumBoolean ' Set variable = me. IsBrak public property Get IsBrak() as enumBoolean LoadFromDatabase AccessTime=Now
IsBrak = m_IsBrak end property
'Упаковать поля в именованную коллекцию 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: NamedValues - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Pack({параметры}) public sub Pack(byref nv as NamedValues) dim nvi as NamedValue set nv = Nothing set nv = new NamedValues
set nvi=nv.Add( "sequence",m_sequence) nvi.ValueType = adInteger ' Reference to wpg_def if m_theGood_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("theGood","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("theGood",m_theGood_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "QinQry",m_QinQry) nvi.ValueType = adDouble ' Reference to wpDic_EDIZM if m_edizm_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("edizm","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("edizm",m_edizm_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "QatHand",m_QatHand) nvi.ValueType = adDouble set nvi=nv.Add( "PricePerUnit",m_PricePerUnit) nvi.ValueType = adDouble set nvi=nv.Add( "UnitToWeight",m_UnitToWeight) nvi.ValueType = adDouble set nvi=nv.Add( "UintToQuantity",m_UintToQuantity) nvi.ValueType = adDouble ' Reference to wpDic_Country if m_TheCountry_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheCountry","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheCountry",m_TheCountry_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpDic_firm if m_TheDeveloper_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheDeveloper","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheDeveloper",m_TheDeveloper_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpDic_factory if m_TheFactory_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheFactory","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheFactory",m_TheFactory_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "SertNum",m_SertNum) nvi.ValueSize = 80 set nvi=nv.Add( "madeDate_from",m_madeDate_from) nvi.ValueType = adDate set nvi=nv.Add( "madedate_to",m_madedate_to) nvi.ValueType = adDate set nvi=nv.Add( "expdate",m_expdate) nvi.ValueType = adDate set nvi=nv.Add( "stopdate",m_stopdate) nvi.ValueType = adDate ' Reference to wpg_S1 if m_S1_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("S1","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("S1",m_S1_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_S2 if m_S2_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("S2","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("S2",m_S2_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpG_S3 if m_S3_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("S3","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("S3",m_S3_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_s4 if m_S4_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("S4","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("S4",m_S4_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_s5 if m_S5_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("S5","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("S5",m_S5_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_D1 if m_D1_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("D1","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("D1",m_D1_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_d2 if m_D2_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("D2","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("D2",m_D2_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_d3 if m_D3_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("D3","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("D3",m_D3_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_d4 if m_D4_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("D4","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("D4",m_D4_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_d5 if m_D5_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("D5","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("D5",m_D5_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "IsBrak",m_IsBrak) nvi.ValueType = adInteger end sub
'Краткое название строки 'Parameters: '[IN] UseServer , тип параметра: boolean = false - ... 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Brief(...параметры...) public function Brief( optional byval UseServer as boolean = false) as string dim s as string if Application.WorkOffline then
m_BRIEF="" if theGood is nothing then m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & m_theGood_ID_BRIEF & "}; " else m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & theGood.Brief & "}; " end if BRIEF= m_BRIEF else on error goto bye if UseServer or m_Brief="" then application.MTZSession.GetBrief PartName, ID, s if len(s) > 255 then Brief = left(s,255) & "..." else Brief = s end if m_Brief = Brief else Brief = m_Brief end if end if exit function bye: Brief = "! доступ запрещен ! (" & err.description & ")" end function
'Распаковать значения полей из именованной коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.UnPack({параметры}) public sub UnPack(byref nv as object) on error resume next if typename(nv) = "NamedValues" then
m_sequence=nv.item( "sequence").Value m_theGood_ID=nv.item( "theGood").Value m_QinQry=nv.item( "QinQry").Value m_edizm_ID=nv.item( "edizm").Value m_QatHand=nv.item( "QatHand").Value m_PricePerUnit=nv.item( "PricePerUnit").Value m_UnitToWeight=nv.item( "UnitToWeight").Value m_UintToQuantity=nv.item( "UintToQuantity").Value m_TheCountry_ID=nv.item( "TheCountry").Value m_TheDeveloper_ID=nv.item( "TheDeveloper").Value m_TheFactory_ID=nv.item( "TheFactory").Value m_SertNum=nv.item( "SertNum").Value m_madeDate_from=nv.item( "madeDate_from").Value m_madedate_to=nv.item( "madedate_to").Value m_expdate=nv.item( "expdate").Value m_stopdate=nv.item( "stopdate").Value m_S1_ID=nv.item( "S1").Value m_S2_ID=nv.item( "S2").Value m_S3_ID=nv.item( "S3").Value m_S4_ID=nv.item( "S4").Value m_S5_ID=nv.item( "S5").Value m_D1_ID=nv.item( "D1").Value m_D2_ID=nv.item( "D2").Value m_D3_ID=nv.item( "D3").Value m_D4_ID=nv.item( "D4").Value m_D5_ID=nv.item( "D5").Value m_IsBrak=nv.item( "IsBrak").Value else
m_sequence=nv.fields( "sequence").Value m_theGood_ID=nv.fields( "theGood").Value m_QinQry=nv.fields( "QinQry").Value m_edizm_ID=nv.fields( "edizm").Value m_QatHand=nv.fields( "QatHand").Value m_PricePerUnit=nv.fields( "PricePerUnit").Value m_UnitToWeight=nv.fields( "UnitToWeight").Value m_UintToQuantity=nv.fields( "UintToQuantity").Value m_TheCountry_ID=nv.fields( "TheCountry").Value m_TheDeveloper_ID=nv.fields( "TheDeveloper").Value m_TheFactory_ID=nv.fields( "TheFactory").Value m_SertNum=nv.fields( "SertNum").Value m_madeDate_from=nv.fields( "madeDate_from").Value m_madedate_to=nv.fields( "madedate_to").Value m_expdate=nv.fields( "expdate").Value m_stopdate=nv.fields( "stopdate").Value m_S1_ID=nv.fields( "S1").Value m_S2_ID=nv.fields( "S2").Value m_S3_ID=nv.fields( "S3").Value m_S4_ID=nv.fields( "S4").Value m_S5_ID=nv.fields( "S5").Value m_D1_ID=nv.fields( "D1").Value m_D2_ID=nv.fields( "D2").Value m_D3_ID=nv.fields( "D3").Value m_D4_ID=nv.fields( "D4").Value m_D5_ID=nv.fields( "D5").Value m_IsBrak=nv.fields( "IsBrak").Value end if end sub
'Очистить поля 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CleanFields() Public Sub CleanFields() dim nv as namedvalues dim o as wpOut_line set o = new wpOut_line set o.Application = me.Application set o.parent = me.parent o.pack nv unpack nv set o = nothing end sub
'Сохранить изменение 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Save() Public Function Save() as boolean LoadFromDatabase if Application.WorkOffline then exit function If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function dim nv as namedvalues pack nv on error goto bye application.MTZSession.SaveRow2 PartName, id, me.Parent.Parent.id ,nv,application.id Changed = false Save = true exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"wpOut_line.Save",err.description End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete() Public Function Delete() as boolean Dim i As Long, ok as boolean if Application.WorkOffline then If Not CanChangeOffLine Then Exit Function on error goto bye m_Deleted = True Delete = True else If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function Delete=application.MTZSession.DeleteRow2( PartName, id, Application.ID) Changed = false 'Compact Closeclass end if exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"wpOut_line.Delete",err.description End Function
'Задать стиль защиты 'Parameters: '[IN] SecurityStyleID , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Secure({параметры}) public sub Secure(byval SecurityStyleID as string) if application.WorkOffline then exit sub On Error goto bye M_SecureStyleID =Application.MTZSession.Secure("wpOut_line" ,ID,SecurityStyleID) exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"wpOut_line.Secure",err.description end sub
'Распространить права на дочерние строки и разделы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Propagate() public sub Propagate() if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Application.MTZSession.Propagate "wpOut_line", ID exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"wpOut_line.Propagate",err.description end sub
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next
if not m_wpout_pal is nothing then m_wpout_pal.CloseClass set m_wpout_pal = nothing end if m_theGood_ID="" set m_theGood= nothing m_edizm_ID="" set m_edizm= nothing m_TheCountry_ID="" set m_TheCountry= nothing m_TheDeveloper_ID="" set m_TheDeveloper= nothing m_TheFactory_ID="" set m_TheFactory= nothing m_S1_ID="" set m_S1= nothing m_S2_ID="" set m_S2= nothing m_S3_ID="" set m_S3= nothing m_S4_ID="" set m_S4= nothing m_S5_ID="" set m_S5= nothing m_D1_ID="" set m_D1= nothing m_D2_ID="" set m_D2= nothing m_D3_ID="" set m_D3= nothing m_D4_ID="" set m_D4= nothing m_D5_ID="" set m_D5= nothing if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "wpOut_line.CloseClass" CloseParents end sub
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public sub Refresh() on error resume next RowRetrived = false m_Brief ="" End sub
'Загрузить из базы данных 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadFromDatabase () Public sub LoadFromDatabase () on error resume next If ID="" then exit sub If Application.WorkOffline then RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now exit sub end if dim rs as adodb.recordset If not RowRetrived then CleanFields set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRow( PartName, id) Unpack rs m_SecureStyleID = rs!SecurityStyleID RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now end if end sub
'Найти строку раздела в дочерних объектах 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object static inFindObject as boolean if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function if inFindObject then exit function inFindObject = true if StrID = PartName then if InstID = ID then set m_FindObject=me end if end if
if m_FindObject is nothing then set m_FindObject = wpout_pal.FindObject(StrID,InstID) end if set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing inFindObject = false end function
'Оптимизировать занятую объектом память 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() if not Changed then CleanFields RowRetrived = false end if
wpout_pal.Compact end sub
'Регистрация изменения значения строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnChange({параметры}) friend sub OnChange(byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) RaiseEvent Change(fieldname,OldValue,NewValue) end sub
'Загрузить из формата XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMNode, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) public sub XMLLoad( node as IXMLDOMNode, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next Dim e_list As IXMLDOMNodeList Dim e_ As IXMLDOMNode if LoadMode <>2 then m_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue m_Deleted=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Deleted").nodeValue m_IsLocked=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue if m_IsLocked >2 then m_IsLocked =0 m_RetriveTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("RetriveTime").nodeValue m_ChangeTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ChangeTime").nodeValue m_AccessTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AccessTime").nodeValue if Application.workoffline and m_IsLocked = LockSession then m_IsLocked = NoLock Secure node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SECURITYSTYLEID").nodeValue sequence=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SEQUENCE").nodeValue set theGood=nothing m_theGood_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEGOOD").nodeValue m_theGood_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEGOOD_BRIEF").nodeValue QinQry=val(Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("QINQRY").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf)) set edizm=nothing m_edizm_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("EDIZM").nodeValue m_edizm_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("EDIZM_BRIEF").nodeValue QatHand=val(Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("QATHAND").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf)) PricePerUnit=val(Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("PRICEPERUNIT").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf)) UnitToWeight=val(Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("UNITTOWEIGHT").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf)) UintToQuantity=val(Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("UINTTOQUANTITY").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf)) set TheCountry=nothing m_TheCountry_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THECOUNTRY").nodeValue m_TheCountry_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THECOUNTRY_BRIEF").nodeValue set TheDeveloper=nothing m_TheDeveloper_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEDEVELOPER").nodeValue m_TheDeveloper_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEDEVELOPER_BRIEF").nodeValue set TheFactory=nothing m_TheFactory_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEFACTORY").nodeValue m_TheFactory_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEFACTORY_BRIEF").nodeValue SertNum=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SERTNUM").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) madeDate_from=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("MADEDATE_FROM").nodeValue madedate_to=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("MADEDATE_TO").nodeValue expdate=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("EXPDATE").nodeValue stopdate=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("STOPDATE").nodeValue set S1=nothing m_S1_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S1").nodeValue m_S1_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S1_BRIEF").nodeValue set S2=nothing m_S2_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S2").nodeValue m_S2_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S2_BRIEF").nodeValue set S3=nothing m_S3_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S3").nodeValue m_S3_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S3_BRIEF").nodeValue set S4=nothing m_S4_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S4").nodeValue m_S4_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S4_BRIEF").nodeValue set S5=nothing m_S5_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S5").nodeValue m_S5_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S5_BRIEF").nodeValue set D1=nothing m_D1_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D1").nodeValue m_D1_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D1_BRIEF").nodeValue set D2=nothing m_D2_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D2").nodeValue m_D2_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D2_BRIEF").nodeValue set D3=nothing m_D3_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D3").nodeValue m_D3_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D3_BRIEF").nodeValue set D4=nothing m_D4_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D4").nodeValue m_D4_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D4_BRIEF").nodeValue set D5=nothing m_D5_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D5").nodeValue m_D5_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D5_BRIEF").nodeValue IsBrak=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ISBRAK").nodeValue on error goto bye 'if m_ChangeTime >= m_RetriveTime then m_Changed = true m_Changed = true m_RowRetrived = true m_Brief = "" on error resume next Set e_list = node.selectNodes("WPOUT_PAL_COL") wpout_pal.XMLLoad e_list, LoadMode exit sub bye: debugoutput err.description end sub
'Сохранить в формате XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) public sub XMLSave(node as IXMLDOMElement, xdom as DomDocument) on error resume next Dim e_ As IXMLDOMElement LoadFromDatabase node.setAttribute "ID", m_ID node.setAttribute "Deleted", m_Deleted node.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked node.setAttribute "RetriveTime", cdbl(m_RetriveTime) node.setAttribute "ChangeTime", cdbl(m_ChangeTime) node.setAttribute "SECURITYSTYLEID", m_SecureStyleID node.setAttribute "SEQUENCE", sequence node.setAttribute "THEGOOD", m_theGood_ID if not (theGood is nothing) then node.setAttribute 'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("wpOut_line", ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("wpOut_line", ID, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "wpOut_line", ID m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("wpOut_line",ID) end function
'Массовое обновление измененных строк 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() PUBLIC sub BatchUpdate() If not Application.WorkOffline Then If Deleted Then Delete Exit Sub End If If Changed Then Save wpout_pal.BatchUpdate End If End sub
'Загрузить все данные документа из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() If not Application.WorkOffline Then LoadFromDatabase wpout_pal.LoadAll End If End sub
'Раскрытие раздела при выборе узла в глобальном дереве 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] tree , тип параметра: object, '[IN] key , тип параметра: string, '[IN] mode , тип параметра: string, '[IN][OUT] optional Mask , тип параметра: string = "" - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Expand({параметры}) public sub Expand(tree as object,byval key as string, byval mode as string, optional Mask as string = "") dim id as string , struct as string, child as string dim item as object, i as long, nid as string, tmpid as string dim tidx as long, tid as string 'only for tree styled structure on error resume next id = mid(key,39,38) struct = right(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key,len(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key)-76) child = right(key,len(key)-76) if id<>m_id then exit sub else set item =me end if tree.nodes.item(key).sorted=true if mode="mnew" then select case child end select end if ' mode="mnew" if mode="main" then select case child case "wpout_pal" item.wpout_pal.refresh for i=1 to item.wpout_pal.count nid =createguid2() & item.wpout_pal.item(i).id & child tree.nodes.add( key,4,nid, item.wpout_pal.item(i).brief(true)).tag="Row" next end select end if ' mode="main" if mode="read" then select case child case "wpout_pal" item.wpout_pal.refresh for i=1 to item.wpout_pal.count nid =createguid2() & item.wpout_pal.item(i).id & child tree.nodes.add( key,4,nid, item.wpout_pal.item(i).brief(true)).tag="Row" next end select end if ' mode="read" if mode="" then select case child end select end if ' mode="" (Default) end sub

AccessTime = value friend property Let AccessTime(newAccessTime as date) m_AccessTime = newAccessTime if m_AccessTime <= m_RetriveTime then m_AccessTime = m_RetriveTime +0.001 end property
'Получить время обращения 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа date 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as date ' variable = me. AccessTime public property Get AccessTime() as date AccessTime = m_AccessTime end property private function GetFromXML(ByVal XML as string, ByVal TagName as string) as string Dim res As String On Error GoTo err Dim XMLDoc As New DOMDocument Call XMLDoc.loadXML(XML) Dim Node As MSXML2.IXMLDOMNode For Each Node In XMLDoc.childNodes.item(0).childNodes If (UCase(Node.baseName) = "BRIEF") Then res = Node.Text Exit For End If Next err: GetFromXML = res End function ' let 'Номер по порядку

m_sequence= newValue end if end property
