'Упаковать поля в именованную коллекцию 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: NamedValues - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Pack({параметры}) public sub Pack(byref nv as NamedValues) dim nvi as NamedValue set nv = Nothing set nv = new NamedValues
set nvi=nv.Add( "sequence",m_sequence) nvi.ValueType = adInteger ' Reference to wpg_def if m_theGood_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("theGood","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("theGood",m_theGood_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "QatHand",m_QatHand) nvi.ValueType = adDouble ' Reference to wpDic_EDIZM if m_edizm_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("edizm","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("edizm",m_edizm_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "Q_Quantity",m_Q_Quantity) nvi.ValueType = adDouble set nvi=nv.Add( "Q_weight",m_Q_weight) nvi.ValueType = adDouble ' Reference to wpDic_Country if m_TheCountry_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheCountry","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheCountry",m_TheCountry_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpDic_firm if m_TheDeveloper_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheDeveloper","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheDeveloper",m_TheDeveloper_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpDic_factory if m_TheFactory_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheFactory","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheFactory",m_TheFactory_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "SertNum",m_SertNum) nvi.ValueSize = 80 set nvi=nv.Add( "madeDate_from",m_madeDate_from) nvi.ValueType = adDate set nvi=nv.Add( "madedate_to",m_madedate_to) nvi.ValueType = adDate set nvi=nv.Add( "expdate",m_expdate) nvi.ValueType = adDate set nvi=nv.Add( "stopdate",m_stopdate) nvi.ValueType = adDate ' Reference to wpPal_def if m_pallet_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("pallet","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("pallet",m_pallet_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpcell_cell if m_TheCell_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("TheCell","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("TheCell",m_TheCell_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_S1 if m_S1_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("S1","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("S1",m_S1_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_S2 if m_S2_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("S2","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("S2",m_S2_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpG_S3 if m_S3_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("S3","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("S3",m_S3_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_s4 if m_S4_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("S4","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("S4",m_S4_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_s5 if m_S5_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("S5","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("S5",m_S5_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_D1 if m_D1_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("D1","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("D1",m_D1_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_d2 if m_D2_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("D2","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("D2",m_D2_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_d3 if m_D3_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("D3","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("D3",m_D3_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_d4 if m_D4_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("D4","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("D4",m_D4_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID ' Reference to wpg_d5 if m_D5_ID="" then set nvi=nv.Add ("D5","") else set nvi=nv.Add ("D5",m_D5_ID) end if nvi.ORACLE_GUID set nvi=nv.Add( "IsBrak",m_IsBrak) nvi.ValueType = adInteger end sub
'Краткое название строки 'Parameters: '[IN] UseServer , тип параметра: boolean = false - ... 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Brief(...параметры...) public function Brief( optional byval UseServer as boolean = false) as string dim s as string if Application.WorkOffline then
m_BRIEF="" if theGood is nothing then m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & m_theGood_ID_BRIEF & "}; " else m_BRIEF=m_BRIEF & "{" & theGood.Brief & "}; " end if BRIEF= m_BRIEF else on error goto bye if UseServer or m_Brief="" then application.MTZSession.GetBrief PartName, ID, s if len(s) > 255 then Brief = left(s,255) & "..." else Brief = s end if m_Brief = Brief else Brief = m_Brief end if end if exit function bye: Brief = "! доступ запрещен ! (" & err.description & ")" end function
'Распаковать значения полей из именованной коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] nv , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.UnPack({параметры}) public sub UnPack(byref nv as object) on error resume next if typename(nv) = "NamedValues" then
m_sequence=nv.item( "sequence").Value m_theGood_ID=nv.item( "theGood").Value m_QatHand=nv.item( "QatHand").Value m_edizm_ID=nv.item( "edizm").Value m_Q_Quantity=nv.item( "Q_Quantity").Value m_Q_weight=nv.item( "Q_weight").Value m_TheCountry_ID=nv.item( "TheCountry").Value m_TheDeveloper_ID=nv.item( "TheDeveloper").Value m_TheFactory_ID=nv.item( "TheFactory").Value m_SertNum=nv.item( "SertNum").Value m_madeDate_from=nv.item( "madeDate_from").Value m_madedate_to=nv.item( "madedate_to").Value m_expdate=nv.item( "expdate").Value m_stopdate=nv.item( "stopdate").Value m_pallet_ID=nv.item( "pallet").Value m_TheCell_ID=nv.item( "TheCell").Value m_S1_ID=nv.item( "S1").Value m_S2_ID=nv.item( "S2").Value m_S3_ID=nv.item( "S3").Value m_S4_ID=nv.item( "S4").Value m_S5_ID=nv.item( "S5").Value m_D1_ID=nv.item( "D1").Value m_D2_ID=nv.item( "D2").Value m_D3_ID=nv.item( "D3").Value m_D4_ID=nv.item( "D4").Value m_D5_ID=nv.item( "D5").Value m_IsBrak=nv.item( "IsBrak").Value else
m_sequence=nv.fields( "sequence").Value m_theGood_ID=nv.fields( "theGood").Value m_QatHand=nv.fields( "QatHand").Value m_edizm_ID=nv.fields( "edizm").Value m_Q_Quantity=nv.fields( "Q_Quantity").Value m_Q_weight=nv.fields( "Q_weight").Value m_TheCountry_ID=nv.fields( "TheCountry").Value m_TheDeveloper_ID=nv.fields( "TheDeveloper").Value m_TheFactory_ID=nv.fields( "TheFactory").Value m_SertNum=nv.fields( "SertNum").Value m_madeDate_from=nv.fields( "madeDate_from").Value m_madedate_to=nv.fields( "madedate_to").Value m_expdate=nv.fields( "expdate").Value m_stopdate=nv.fields( "stopdate").Value m_pallet_ID=nv.fields( "pallet").Value m_TheCell_ID=nv.fields( "TheCell").Value m_S1_ID=nv.fields( "S1").Value m_S2_ID=nv.fields( "S2").Value m_S3_ID=nv.fields( "S3").Value m_S4_ID=nv.fields( "S4").Value m_S5_ID=nv.fields( "S5").Value m_D1_ID=nv.fields( "D1").Value m_D2_ID=nv.fields( "D2").Value m_D3_ID=nv.fields( "D3").Value m_D4_ID=nv.fields( "D4").Value m_D5_ID=nv.fields( "D5").Value m_IsBrak=nv.fields( "IsBrak").Value end if end sub
'Очистить поля 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CleanFields() Public Sub CleanFields() dim nv as namedvalues dim o as wpout_pal set o = new wpout_pal set o.Application = me.Application set o.parent = me.parent o.pack nv unpack nv set o = nothing end sub
'Сохранить изменение 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Save() Public Function Save() as boolean LoadFromDatabase if Application.WorkOffline then exit function If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function dim nv as namedvalues pack nv on error goto bye application.MTZSession.SaveRow2 PartName, id, me.Parent.Parent.id ,nv,application.id Changed = false Save = true exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"wpout_pal.Save",err.description End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete() Public Function Delete() as boolean Dim i As Long, ok as boolean if Application.WorkOffline then If Not CanChangeOffLine Then Exit Function on error goto bye m_Deleted = True Delete = True else If Not CanChangeONLine Then Exit Function Delete=application.MTZSession.DeleteRow2( PartName, id, Application.ID) Changed = false 'Compact Closeclass end if exit function bye: err.raise err.number,"wpout_pal.Delete",err.description End Function
'Задать стиль защиты 'Parameters: '[IN] SecurityStyleID , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Secure({параметры}) public sub Secure(byval SecurityStyleID as string) if application.WorkOffline then exit sub On Error goto bye M_SecureStyleID =Application.MTZSession.Secure("wpout_pal" ,ID,SecurityStyleID) exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"wpout_pal.Secure",err.description end sub
'Распространить права на дочерние строки и разделы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Propagate() public sub Propagate() if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Application.MTZSession.Propagate "wpout_pal", ID exit sub bye: err.raise err.number,"wpout_pal.Propagate",err.description end sub
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next
m_theGood_ID="" set m_theGood= nothing m_edizm_ID="" set m_edizm= nothing m_TheCountry_ID="" set m_TheCountry= nothing m_TheDeveloper_ID="" set m_TheDeveloper= nothing m_TheFactory_ID="" set m_TheFactory= nothing m_pallet_ID="" set m_pallet= nothing m_TheCell_ID="" set m_TheCell= nothing m_S1_ID="" set m_S1= nothing m_S2_ID="" set m_S2= nothing m_S3_ID="" set m_S3= nothing m_S4_ID="" set m_S4= nothing m_S5_ID="" set m_S5= nothing m_D1_ID="" set m_D1= nothing m_D2_ID="" set m_D2= nothing m_D3_ID="" set m_D3= nothing m_D4_ID="" set m_D4= nothing m_D5_ID="" set m_D5= nothing if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "wpout_pal.CloseClass" CloseParents end sub
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public sub Refresh() on error resume next RowRetrived = false m_Brief ="" End sub
'Загрузить из базы данных 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadFromDatabase () Public sub LoadFromDatabase () on error resume next If ID="" then exit sub If Application.WorkOffline then RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now exit sub end if dim rs as adodb.recordset If not RowRetrived then CleanFields set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRow( PartName, id) Unpack rs m_SecureStyleID = rs!SecurityStyleID RowRetrived = true RetriveTime = now end if end sub
'Найти строку раздела в дочерних объектах 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object static inFindObject as boolean if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function if inFindObject then exit function inFindObject = true if StrID = PartName then if InstID = ID then set m_FindObject=me end if end if
set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing inFindObject = false end function
'Оптимизировать занятую объектом память 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() if not Changed then CleanFields RowRetrived = false end if
end sub
'Регистрация изменения значения строки 'Parameters: '[IN] fieldName , тип параметра: string, '[IN] OldValue,, тип параметра: Variant '[IN][OUT] NewValue, тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.OnChange({параметры}) friend sub OnChange(byval fieldName as string, byval OldValue, byref NewValue) RaiseEvent Change(fieldname,OldValue,NewValue) end sub
'Загрузить из формата XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMNode, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) public sub XMLLoad( node as IXMLDOMNode, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next Dim e_list As IXMLDOMNodeList Dim e_ As IXMLDOMNode if LoadMode <>2 then m_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue m_Deleted=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Deleted").nodeValue m_IsLocked=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue if m_IsLocked >2 then m_IsLocked =0 m_RetriveTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("RetriveTime").nodeValue m_ChangeTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ChangeTime").nodeValue m_AccessTime=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("AccessTime").nodeValue if Application.workoffline and m_IsLocked = LockSession then m_IsLocked = NoLock Secure node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SECURITYSTYLEID").nodeValue sequence=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SEQUENCE").nodeValue set theGood=nothing m_theGood_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEGOOD").nodeValue m_theGood_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEGOOD_BRIEF").nodeValue QatHand=val(Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("QATHAND").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf)) set edizm=nothing m_edizm_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("EDIZM").nodeValue m_edizm_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("EDIZM_BRIEF").nodeValue Q_Quantity=val(Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Q_QUANTITY").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf)) Q_weight=val(Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("Q_WEIGHT").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf)) set TheCountry=nothing m_TheCountry_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THECOUNTRY").nodeValue m_TheCountry_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THECOUNTRY_BRIEF").nodeValue set TheDeveloper=nothing m_TheDeveloper_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEDEVELOPER").nodeValue m_TheDeveloper_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEDEVELOPER_BRIEF").nodeValue set TheFactory=nothing m_TheFactory_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEFACTORY").nodeValue m_TheFactory_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THEFACTORY_BRIEF").nodeValue SertNum=Replace(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("SERTNUM").nodeValue,vbLf,vbcrlf) madeDate_from=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("MADEDATE_FROM").nodeValue madedate_to=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("MADEDATE_TO").nodeValue expdate=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("EXPDATE").nodeValue stopdate=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("STOPDATE").nodeValue set pallet=nothing m_pallet_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("PALLET").nodeValue m_pallet_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("PALLET_BRIEF").nodeValue set TheCell=nothing m_TheCell_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THECELL").nodeValue m_TheCell_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("THECELL_BRIEF").nodeValue set S1=nothing m_S1_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S1").nodeValue m_S1_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S1_BRIEF").nodeValue set S2=nothing m_S2_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S2").nodeValue m_S2_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S2_BRIEF").nodeValue set S3=nothing m_S3_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S3").nodeValue m_S3_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S3_BRIEF").nodeValue set S4=nothing m_S4_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S4").nodeValue m_S4_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S4_BRIEF").nodeValue set S5=nothing m_S5_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S5").nodeValue m_S5_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("S5_BRIEF").nodeValue set D1=nothing m_D1_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D1").nodeValue m_D1_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D1_BRIEF").nodeValue set D2=nothing m_D2_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D2").nodeValue m_D2_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D2_BRIEF").nodeValue set D3=nothing m_D3_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D3").nodeValue m_D3_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D3_BRIEF").nodeValue set D4=nothing m_D4_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D4").nodeValue m_D4_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D4_BRIEF").nodeValue set D5=nothing m_D5_ID=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D5").nodeValue m_D5_ID_BRIEF=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("D5_BRIEF").nodeValue IsBrak=node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ISBRAK").nodeValue on error goto bye 'if m_ChangeTime >= m_RetriveTime then m_Changed = true m_Changed = true m_RowRetrived = true m_Brief = "" on error resume next exit sub bye: debugoutput err.description end sub
'Сохранить в формате XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] node , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) public sub XMLSave(node as IXMLDOMElement, xdom as DomDocument) on error resume next Dim e_ As IXMLDOMElement LoadFromDatabase node.setAttribute "ID", m_ID node.setAttribute "Deleted", m_Deleted node.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked node.setAttribute "RetriveTime", cdbl(m_RetriveTime) node.setAttribute "ChangeTime", cdbl(m_ChangeTime) node.setAttribute "SECURITYSTYLEID", m_SecureStyleID node.setAttribute "SEQUENCE", sequence node.setAttribute "THEGOOD", m_theGood_ID if not (theGood is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THEGOOD_BRIEF", theGood.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THEGOOD_BRIEF", m_theGood_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "QATHAND", replace(cstr(QatHand),",",".") node.setAttribute "EDIZM", m_edizm_ID if not (edizm is nothing) then node.setAttribute "EDIZM_BRIEF", edizm.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "EDIZM_BRIEF", m_edizm_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "Q_QUANTITY", replace(cstr(Q_Quantity),",",".") node.setAttribute "Q_WEIGHT", replace(cstr(Q_weight),",",".") node.setAttribute "THECOUNTRY", m_TheCountry_ID if not (TheCountry is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THECOUNTRY_BRIEF", TheCountry.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THECOUNTRY_BRIEF", m_TheCountry_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "THEDEVELOPER", m_TheDeveloper_ID if not (TheDeveloper is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THEDEVELOPER_BRIEF", TheDeveloper.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THEDEVELOPER_BRIEF", m_TheDeveloper_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "THEFACTORY", m_TheFactory_ID if not (TheFactory is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THEFACTORY_BRIEF", TheFactory.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THEFACTORY_BRIEF", m_TheFactory_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "SERTNUM", SertNum node.setAttribute "MADEDATE_FROM", Cdbl(madeDate_from) node.setAttribute "MADEDATE_TO", Cdbl(madedate_to) node.setAttribute "EXPDATE", Cdbl(expdate) node.setAttribute "STOPDATE", Cdbl(stopdate) node.setAttribute "PALLET", m_pallet_ID if not (pallet is nothing) then node.setAttribute "PALLET_BRIEF", pallet.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "PALLET_BRIEF", m_pallet_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "THECELL", m_TheCell_ID if not (TheCell is nothing) then node.setAttribute "THECELL_BRIEF", TheCell.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "THECELL_BRIEF", m_TheCell_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "S1", m_S1_ID if not (S1 is nothing) then node.setAttribute "S1_BRIEF", S1.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "S1_BRIEF", m_S1_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "S2", m_S2_ID if not (S2 is nothing) then node.setAttribute "S2_BRIEF", S2.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "S2_BRIEF", m_S2_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "S3", m_S3_ID if not (S3 is nothing) then node.setAttribute "S3_BRIEF", S3.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "S3_BRIEF", m_S3_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "S4", m_S4_ID if not (S4 is nothing) then node.setAttribute "S4_BRIEF", S4.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "S4_BRIEF", m_S4_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "S5", m_S5_ID if not (S5 is nothing) then node.setAttribute "S5_BRIEF", S5.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "S5_BRIEF", m_S5_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "D1", m_D1_ID if not (D1 is nothing) then node.setAttribute "D1_BRIEF", D1.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "D1_BRIEF", m_D1_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "D2", m_D2_ID if not (D2 is nothing) then node.setAttribute "D2_BRIEF", D2.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "D2_BRIEF", m_D2_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "D3", m_D3_ID if not (D3 is nothing) then node.setAttribute "D3_BRIEF", D3.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "D3_BRIEF", m_D3_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "D4", m_D4_ID if not (D4 is nothing) then node.setAttribute "D4_BRIEF", D4.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "D4_BRIEF", m_D4_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "D5", m_D5_ID if not (D5 is nothing) then node.setAttribute "D5_BRIEF", D5.BRIEF else node.setAttribute "D5_BRIEF", m_D5_ID_BRIEF end if node.setAttribute "ISBRAK", IsBrak node.setAttribute "AccessTime", cdbl(m_AccessTime) end sub
'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("wpout_pal", ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("wpout_pal", ID, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "wpout_pal", ID m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("wpout_pal",ID) end function
'Массовое обновление измененных строк 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() PUBLIC sub BatchUpdate() If not Application.WorkOffline Then If Deleted Then Delete Exit Sub End If If Changed Then Save End If End sub
'Загрузить все данные документа из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() If not Application.WorkOffline Then LoadFromDatabase End If End sub
'Раскрытие раздела при выборе узла в глобальном дереве 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] tree , тип параметра: object, '[IN] key , тип параметра: string, '[IN] mode , тип параметра: string, '[IN][OUT] optional Mask , тип параметра: string = "" - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Expand({параметры}) public sub Expand(tree as object,byval key as string, byval mode as string, optional Mask as string = "") dim id as string , struct as string, child as string dim item as object, i as long, nid as string, tmpid as string dim tidx as long, tid as string 'only for tree styled structure on error resume next id = mid(key,39,38) struct = right(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key,len(tree.nodes.item(key).parent.parent.key)-76) child = right(key,len(key)-76) if id<>m_id then exit sub else set item =me end if tree.nodes.item(key).sorted=true if mode="mnew" then select case child end select end if ' mode="mnew" if mode="main" then select case child end select end if ' mode="main" if mode="read" then select case child end select end if ' mode="read" if mode="" then select case child end select end if ' mode="" (Default) end sub
'раздел dim mcol as SortableCollection dim m_Parent as object dim m_Application as Application dim m_Filter as string private m_IsLocked as LockStyle

'Название таблицы раздела 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. ChildPartName Friend property Get ChildPartName() as string ChildPartName = "wpOut_line" end property
'Задать родительский объект в иерархии документа 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newParent , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' set value = new Variant ' set me. Parent = value friend property Set Parent(newParent as object) set m_Parent = newParent end property
'Получить родительский объект в иерархии документа 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me. Parent public property Get Parent() as object set Parent = m_Parent end property
'Задать корневой объект 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newApplication , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' set value = new Variant ' set me. Application = value friend property Set Application(newApplication as object) set m_Application = newApplication m_Application.Logger.Message "wpOut_line.Init" end property
'Получить корневой объект 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса Application ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as Application ' Set variable = me. Application public property Get Application() as Application if m_Parent is nothing then set Application = me else set Application = m_Application end if end property
'Задать дополнительный фильтр коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN] newFilter , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. Filter = value public property Let Filter(byval newFilter as string) m_Filter = newFilter Refresh end property
'Получить значение фильтра 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Filter public property Get Filter() as string Filter = m_Filter end property
'Разрушить иерархическую связку с родительскими объектами 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseParents() private sub CloseParents() set m_Application = nothing set m_Parent = nothing end sub
'Добавить строку в раздел (но не в базу данных) 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] ID , тип параметра: string="" - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpOut_line ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpOut_line ' Set variable = me.Add(...параметры...) Public function Add(optional ID as string="") as wpOut_line dim LID as string dim o as wpOut_line if ID="" then LID = createguid2() else LID = left(ID,38) endif on error resume next if mcol.count > 0 then if mcol.item(Lid) is nothing then goto addnew else set Add = mcol.Item( LID) exit function end if end if addnew: set o = new wpOut_line o.ID =LID o.RowRetrived = False Set o.Parent = Me Set o.Application = Me.Application me.application.AddToCash childPartName & lid , o set add = o mcol.AddItem o,o.ID set o = nothing end function
'Получить строку раздела 'Parameters: '[IN] ID , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpOut_line ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpOut_line ' Set variable = me.Item(...параметры...) Public function Item(byval ID as variant) as wpOut_line Attribute Item.VB_MemberFlags = "200" on error resume next dim o as wpOut_line If Not mCol.Item(ID) Is Nothing Then Set o = mCol.Item(ID) set Item = o set o = nothing exit function end if end function
'Найти строку по идентификатору в дочерней иерархии 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object, i as long if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function If Not application.MTZSession.IsDescendant(StrID, ChildPartName) Then Exit Function if StrID = ChildPartName then set m_FindObject = Item(Instid) if not m_FindObject is nothing then goto OK end if for i = 1 to Count set m_FindObject = Item(i).FindObject(StrID,InstID) if not m_FindObject is nothing then exit for next OK: set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing end function
'Оптимизировать использование памяти 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() dim i as long for i = 1 to Count Item(i).Compact next end sub
'Задать поле по которому будем сортировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Name , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. Sort = value public property let Sort(byval Name as string) mcol.Sort name end property
'Получить значения поля - основы сортировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Sort public property get Sort() as string Sort = mcol.sortname end property
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpOut_line ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpOut_line ' Set variable = me.GetEQ(...параметры...) Public function GetEQ(byval Value as variant) as wpOut_line set GetEQ = mcol.getEQ(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки меньше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpOut_line ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpOut_line ' Set variable = me.GetLE(...параметры...) Public function GetLE(byval Value as variant) as wpOut_line set GetLE = mcol.getLE(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки меньше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpOut_line ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpOut_line ' Set variable = me.GetLT(...параметры...) Public function GetLT(byval Value as variant) as wpOut_line set GetLT = mcol.getLT(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки больше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpOut_line ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpOut_line ' Set variable = me.GetGE(...параметры...) Public function GetGE(byval Value as variant) as wpOut_line set GetGE = mcol.getGE(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки больше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpOut_line ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpOut_line ' Set variable = me.GetGT(...параметры...) Public function GetGT(byval Value as variant) as wpOut_line set GetGT = mcol.getGT(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetEQPos(...параметры...) Public function GetEQPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetEQPos = mcol.getEQpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки меньше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetLEPos(...параметры...) Public function GetLEPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetLEPos = mcol.getLEpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки меньше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetLTPos(...параметры...) Public function GetLTPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetLTPos = mcol.getLTpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки больше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetGEPos(...параметры...) Public function GetGEPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetGEPos = mcol.getGEpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки больше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetGTPos(...параметры...) Public function GetGTPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetGTPos = mcol.getGTpos(Value) end function
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next dim i as long dim o as wpOut_line For i = 1 To mcol.Count Set o = mcol.Item(i) o.CloseClass Next if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "wpOut_line.CloseClass" CloseParents set mcol = nothing end sub
'Инициализация коллекции 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Class_Initialize() Private Sub Class_Initialize() set mcol = new SortableCollection End Sub
'Количетсво строк в коллекции 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа Long 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as Long ' variable = me. Count Public Property Get Count() As Long count = mCol.count End Property
'Удалить строку из коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN] vntIndexKey , тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Remove({параметры}) public Sub Remove(byval vntIndexKey As Variant) on error resume next me.application.RemoveFromCash childPartName & item(vntIndexKey).id mCol.Remove vntIndexKey End Sub
'Сохранить изменения в строке 'Parameters: '[IN] vntIndexKey , тип параметра: Variant - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Update(...параметры...) Public Function Update(byval vntIndexKey As Variant) as boolean if not Item(vntIndexKey) is nothing then Update = Item(vntIndexKey).Save else Update = false end if End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: '[IN] vntIndexKey , тип параметра: Variant - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete(...параметры...) Public Function Delete(byval vntIndexKey As Variant) as boolean on error goto bye Dim o As wpOut_line Set o = item(vntIndexKey) If o Is Nothing Then Exit Function If o.Delete Then Delete = True mcol.Remove vntIndexKey End If Exit Function bye: Err.Raise Err.Number, "Delete", Err.Description End Function
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public Sub Refresh() On Error Resume Next Dim mcol2 As SortableCollection Set mcol2 = mcol Set mcol = Nothing Set mcol = New SortableCollection Dim rs As ADODB.recordset if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Dim o As wpOut_line dim tmpParent as object dim tID as string dim SSID as string dim rtime as date rtime =Now rtime =application.MTZSession.GetServertime() if application.AutoLoadPart then set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRows( ChildPartName, Parent.id,,Filter) else set rs =application.MTZSession.GetIDs( ChildPartName, Parent.id,,Filter) end if If mcol2 Is Nothing Then Set mcol2 = New SortableCollection dim idx as long if not rs is nothing then ' wrong database structure while not rs.eof if application.AutoLoadPart then tID = rs!wpOut_lineID else tid=rs!id end if on error resume next SSid=rs!SecurityStyleID & "" If mcol2.Item(tID) Is Nothing Then Set o = Add(tID) if application.AutoLoadPart then o.unpack rs o.RowRetrived = True o.RetriveTime = rtime end if Else Set o = mcol2.Item(tID) If o.RowRetrived Then If o.RetriveTime < rs!ChangeStamp Then if application.AutoLoadPart then o.CleanFields o.unpack rs o.RetriveTime = rtime else o.RowRetrived = False end if End If else if application.AutoLoadPart then o.CleanFields o.unpack rs o.RetriveTime = rtime end if End If mcol.AddItem o, tID mcol2.Remove tID End If o.SecureStyleID = SSID rs.MoveNext wend end if ' rs is nothing For idx = 1 To mcol2.Count Set o = mcol2.Item(idx) o.CloseClass Next Set mcol2 = Nothing End Sub
'Сохранить данные в структуре XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] ParentNode , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] Xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) Public Sub XMLSave(byref ParentNode as IXMLDOMElement, Xdom as DomDocument) dim o as wpOut_line dim i as long dim pnode as IXMLDOMElement set pnode = xdom.CreateElement("WPOUT_LINE_COL") pnode.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked dim node as IXMLDOMElement ParentNode.appendChild pnode for i=1 to count set o = item(i) set node = xdom.CreateElement("WPOUT_LINE") Pnode.appendChild node o.XmlSave node, xdom next End sub
'Загрузить данные из XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] NodeList , тип параметра: IXMLDOMnodeList, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) Public Sub XMLLoad(byref NodeList as IXMLDOMnodeList, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next dim o as wpOut_line dim node as IXMLDOMElement dim pnode as IXMLDOMElement NodeList.Reset set pnode = NodeList.NextNode m_IsLocked=pnode.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue Set NodeList = pnode.selectNodes("WPOUT_LINE") dim bufcol as collection if loadmode =1 then set bufcol = new collection end if set node = NodeList.NextNode While not node is nothing ' append mode if loadmode =0 then if item(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue) is nothing then Add(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue).xmlload node, loadmode else Item(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue).xmlload node, loadmode end if end if ' replace mode if loadmode =1 then if item(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue) is nothing then Add(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue).xmlload node, loadmode else Item(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue).xmlload node, loadmode end if bufcol.add Item(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue),node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue end if ' copy with new ID mode if loadmode =2 then Add().xmlload node, loadmode end if set node = NodeList.NextNode wend ' remove extra items from collection if loadmode =1 then dim i as long ' remove existing removeAgain: for i=1 to count if bufcol.item(item(i).id) is nothing then Delete item(i).id goto removeAgain end if next set bufcol = nothing end if End sub
'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("INSTANCE", parent.ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("INSTANCE", parent.id, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "INSTANCE", parent.id m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("INSTANCE", parent.ID) end function
'Настройка грида на вывод раздела 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] YGrid , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.PrepareGrid({параметры}) public sub PrepareGrid(YGrid as object) YGrid.ItemCount = 0 YGrid.Groups.Clear YGrid.SortKeys.Clear YGrid.Columns.Clear YGrid.Columns.Add("Номер по порядку", 0, 0, "sequence").SortType =2 YGrid.Columns.Add("Товар", 0, 0, "theGood").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Кол-во по заказу", 0, 0, "QinQry").SortType =2 YGrid.Columns.Add("Ед. изм.", 0, 0, "edizm").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Кол-во по факту", 0, 0, "QatHand").SortType =2 YGrid.Columns.Add("Цена за единицу", 0, 0, "PricePerUnit").SortType =2 YGrid.Columns.Add("Перевод в килограммы", 0, 0, "UnitToWeight").SortType =2 YGrid.Columns.Add("Перевод в штуки", 0, 0, "UintToQuantity").SortType =2 YGrid.Columns.Add("Страна", 0, 0, "TheCountry").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Производитель", 0, 0, "TheDeveloper").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Завод", 0, 0, "TheFactory").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Сертификат", 0, 0, "SertNum").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Дата производства с", 0, 0, "madeDate_from").SortType =4 YGrid.Columns.Add("Дата производства по", 0, 0, "madedate_to").SortType =4 YGrid.Columns.Add("Окончание срока годности", 0, 0, "expdate").SortType =4 YGrid.Columns.Add("Дата окончания хранения", 0, 0, "stopdate").SortType =4 YGrid.Columns.Add("С-Аналитика 1", 0, 0, "S1").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("С-Аналитика 2", 0, 0, "S2").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("С-Аналитика 3", 0, 0, "S3").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("С-Аналитика 4", 0, 0, "S4").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("С-Аналитика 5", 0, 0, "S5").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Д-Аналитика 1", 0, 0, "D1").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Д-Аналитика 2", 0, 0, "D2").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Д-Аналитика 3", 0, 0, "D3").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Д-Аналитика 4", 0, 0, "D4").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Д-Аналитика 5", 0, 0, "D5").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Брак", 0, 0, "IsBrak").SortType =1 YGrid.ItemCount = count end sub
'Чтение данных строки раздела в грид 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] YGrid , тип параметра: object, '[IN] RowIndex , тип параметра: Long, '[IN] Bookmark , тип параметра: Variant, '[IN][OUT] Values , тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadRow({параметры}) public sub LoadRow(YGrid as object, ByVal RowIndex As Long, ByVal Bookmark As Variant, Values ) dim obj as wpOut_line If RowIndex > 0 And RowIndex <= Count Then 'If not IsEmpty(BookMArk) then ' set obj = item(left(bookmark,38)) 'else set obj = item(rowindex) 'end If if obj is nothing then exit sub on error resume next Values.Value(1) = Left(Replace(obj.sequence, vbCrLf, " "), 255) if obj.theGood is nothing then Values.Value(2) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(2) = Left(Replace(obj.theGood.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if Values.Value(3) = Left(Replace(obj.QinQry, vbCrLf, " "), 255) if obj.edizm is nothing then Values.Value(4) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(4) = Left(Replace(obj.edizm.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if Values.Value(5) = Left(Replace(obj.QatHand, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(6) = Left(Replace(obj.PricePerUnit, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(7) = Left(Replace(obj.UnitToWeight, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(8) = Left(Replace(obj.UintToQuantity, vbCrLf, " "), 255) if obj.TheCountry is nothing then Values.Value(9) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(9) = Left(Replace(obj.TheCountry.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.TheDeveloper is nothing then Values.Value(10) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(10) = Left(Replace(obj.TheDeveloper.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.TheFactory is nothing then Values.Value(11) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(11) = Left(Replace(obj.TheFactory.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if Values.Value(12) = Left(Replace(obj.SertNum, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(13) = Left(Replace(obj.madeDate_from, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(14) = Left(Replace(obj.madedate_to, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(15) = Left(Replace(obj.expdate, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(16) = Left(Replace(obj.stopdate, vbCrLf, " "), 255) if obj.S1 is nothing then Values.Value(17) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(17) = Left(Replace(obj.S1.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.S2 is nothing then Values.Value(18) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(18) = Left(Replace(obj.S2.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.S3 is nothing then Values.Value(19) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(19) = Left(Replace(obj.S3.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.S4 is nothing then Values.Value(20) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(20) = Left(Replace(obj.S4.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.S5 is nothing then Values.Value(21) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(21) = Left(Replace(obj.S5.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.D1 is nothing then Values.Value(22) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(22) = Left(Replace(obj.D1.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.D2 is nothing then Values.Value(23) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(23) = Left(Replace(obj.D2.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.D3 is nothing then Values.Value(24) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(24) = Left(Replace(obj.D3.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.D4 is nothing then Values.Value(25) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(25) = Left(Replace(obj.D4.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.D5 is nothing then Values.Value(26) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(26) = Left(Replace(obj.D5.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.IsBrak =-1 then Values.Value(27) = "Да" end if if obj.IsBrak =0 then Values.Value(27) = "Нет" end if YGRID.RowBookmark(RowIndex) = obj.id & "wpOut_line" End If 'RowIndex end sub
'Массовое обновление измененных строк коллекции 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() friend sub BatchUpdate() on error goto bye If not Application.WorkOffline Then dim i as long again: for i=1 to count If item(i) Is Nothing Then Exit For If item(i).Deleted Then If Delete(i) Then GoTo again Else on error resume next item(i).BatchUpdate on error goto bye End If next End If bye: End sub
'Загрузка данных из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() on error goto bye If not Application.WorkOffline Then dim i as long Refresh for i=1 to count item(i).LoadAll next End If bye: End sub
'раздел dim mcol as SortableCollection dim m_Parent as object dim m_Application as Application dim m_Filter as string private m_IsLocked as LockStyle

'Название таблицы раздела 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. ChildPartName Friend property Get ChildPartName() as string ChildPartName = "wpout_pal" end property
'Задать родительский объект в иерархии документа 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newParent , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' set value = new Variant ' set me. Parent = value friend property Set Parent(newParent as object) set m_Parent = newParent end property
'Получить родительский объект в иерархии документа 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me. Parent public property Get Parent() as object set Parent = m_Parent end property
'Задать корневой объект 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newApplication , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' set value = new Variant ' set me. Application = value friend property Set Application(newApplication as object) set m_Application = newApplication m_Application.Logger.Message "wpout_pal.Init" end property
'Получить корневой объект 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса Application ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as Application ' Set variable = me. Application public property Get Application() as Application if m_Parent is nothing then set Application = me else set Application = m_Application end if end property
'Задать дополнительный фильтр коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN] newFilter , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. Filter = value public property Let Filter(byval newFilter as string) m_Filter = newFilter Refresh end property
'Получить значение фильтра 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Filter public property Get Filter() as string Filter = m_Filter end property
'Разрушить иерархическую связку с родительскими объектами 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseParents() private sub CloseParents() set m_Application = nothing set m_Parent = nothing end sub
'Добавить строку в раздел (но не в базу данных) 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] ID , тип параметра: string="" - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpout_pal ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpout_pal ' Set variable = me.Add(...параметры...) Public function Add(optional ID as string="") as wpout_pal dim LID as string dim o as wpout_pal if ID="" then LID = createguid2() else LID = left(ID,38) endif on error resume next if mcol.count > 0 then if mcol.item(Lid) is nothing then goto addnew else set Add = mcol.Item( LID) exit function end if end if addnew: set o = new wpout_pal o.ID =LID o.RowRetrived = False Set o.Parent = Me Set o.Application = Me.Application me.application.AddToCash childPartName & lid , o set add = o mcol.AddItem o,o.ID set o = nothing end function
'Получить строку раздела 'Parameters: '[IN] ID , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpout_pal ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpout_pal ' Set variable = me.Item(...параметры...) Public function Item(byval ID as variant) as wpout_pal Attribute Item.VB_MemberFlags = "200" on error resume next dim o as wpout_pal If Not mCol.Item(ID) Is Nothing Then Set o = mCol.Item(ID) set Item = o set o = nothing exit function end if end function
'Найти строку по идентификатору в дочерней иерархии 'Parameters: '[IN] StrID , тип параметра: string, '[IN] InstID , тип параметра: string - ... 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me.FindObject(...параметры...) public function FindObject(byval StrID as string, byval InstID as string) as object dim m_FindObject as object, i as long if StrID = "" then exit function if InstID = "" then exit function If Not application.MTZSession.IsDescendant(StrID, ChildPartName) Then Exit Function if StrID = ChildPartName then set m_FindObject = Item(Instid) if not m_FindObject is nothing then goto OK end if for i = 1 to Count set m_FindObject = Item(i).FindObject(StrID,InstID) if not m_FindObject is nothing then exit for next OK: set FindObject = m_findobject set m_FindObject = nothing end function
'Оптимизировать использование памяти 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Compact() public sub Compact() dim i as long for i = 1 to Count Item(i).Compact next end sub
'Задать поле по которому будем сортировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Name , тип параметра: string - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. Sort = value public property let Sort(byval Name as string) mcol.Sort name end property
'Получить значения поля - основы сортировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. Sort public property get Sort() as string Sort = mcol.sortname end property
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpout_pal ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpout_pal ' Set variable = me.GetEQ(...параметры...) Public function GetEQ(byval Value as variant) as wpout_pal set GetEQ = mcol.getEQ(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки меньше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpout_pal ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpout_pal ' Set variable = me.GetLE(...параметры...) Public function GetLE(byval Value as variant) as wpout_pal set GetLE = mcol.getLE(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки меньше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpout_pal ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpout_pal ' Set variable = me.GetLT(...параметры...) Public function GetLT(byval Value as variant) as wpout_pal set GetLT = mcol.getLT(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки больше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpout_pal ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpout_pal ' Set variable = me.GetGE(...параметры...) Public function GetGE(byval Value as variant) as wpout_pal set GetGE = mcol.getGE(Value) end function
'Получить строку в кот. поле сортировки больше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса wpout_pal ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as wpout_pal ' Set variable = me.GetGT(...параметры...) Public function GetGT(byval Value as variant) as wpout_pal set GetGT = mcol.getGT(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetEQPos(...параметры...) Public function GetEQPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetEQPos = mcol.getEQpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки меньше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetLEPos(...параметры...) Public function GetLEPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetLEPos = mcol.getLEpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки меньше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetLTPos(...параметры...) Public function GetLTPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetLTPos = mcol.getLTpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки больше или равно значению 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetGEPos(...параметры...) Public function GetGEPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetGEPos = mcol.getGEpos(Value) end function
'Получить номер строки в кот. поле сортировки больше значения 'Parameters: '[IN] Value , тип параметра: variant - ... 'Returns: ' объект класса long ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as long ' Set variable = me.GetGTPos(...параметры...) Public function GetGTPos(byval Value as variant) as long GetGTPos = mcol.getGTpos(Value) end function
'Деструктор 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseClass() Friend sub CloseClass() on error resume next dim i as long dim o as wpout_pal For i = 1 To mcol.Count Set o = mcol.Item(i) o.CloseClass Next if not Application is nothing then Application.Logger.Message "wpout_pal.CloseClass" CloseParents set mcol = nothing end sub
'Инициализация коллекции 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Class_Initialize() Private Sub Class_Initialize() set mcol = new SortableCollection End Sub
'Количетсво строк в коллекции 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа Long 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as Long ' variable = me. Count Public Property Get Count() As Long count = mCol.count End Property
'Удалить строку из коллекции 'Parameters: '[IN] vntIndexKey , тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Remove({параметры}) public Sub Remove(byval vntIndexKey As Variant) on error resume next me.application.RemoveFromCash childPartName & item(vntIndexKey).id mCol.Remove vntIndexKey End Sub
'Сохранить изменения в строке 'Parameters: '[IN] vntIndexKey , тип параметра: Variant - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Update(...параметры...) Public Function Update(byval vntIndexKey As Variant) as boolean if not Item(vntIndexKey) is nothing then Update = Item(vntIndexKey).Save else Update = false end if End Function
'Удалить строку 'Parameters: '[IN] vntIndexKey , тип параметра: Variant - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.Delete(...параметры...) Public Function Delete(byval vntIndexKey As Variant) as boolean on error goto bye Dim o As wpout_pal Set o = item(vntIndexKey) If o Is Nothing Then Exit Function If o.Delete Then Delete = True mcol.Remove vntIndexKey End If Exit Function bye: Err.Raise Err.Number, "Delete", Err.Description End Function
'Обновить 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.Refresh() Public Sub Refresh() On Error Resume Next Dim mcol2 As SortableCollection Set mcol2 = mcol Set mcol = Nothing Set mcol = New SortableCollection Dim rs As ADODB.recordset if application.WorkOffline then exit sub Dim o As wpout_pal dim tmpParent as object dim tID as string dim SSID as string dim rtime as date rtime =Now rtime =application.MTZSession.GetServertime() if application.AutoLoadPart then set rs =application.MTZSession.GetRows( ChildPartName, Parent.id,,Filter) else set rs =application.MTZSession.GetIDs( ChildPartName, Parent.id,,Filter) end if If mcol2 Is Nothing Then Set mcol2 = New SortableCollection dim idx as long if not rs is nothing then ' wrong database structure while not rs.eof if application.AutoLoadPart then tID = rs!wpout_palID else tid=rs!id end if on error resume next SSid=rs!SecurityStyleID & "" If mcol2.Item(tID) Is Nothing Then Set o = Add(tID) if application.AutoLoadPart then o.unpack rs o.RowRetrived = True o.RetriveTime = rtime end if Else Set o = mcol2.Item(tID) If o.RowRetrived Then If o.RetriveTime < rs!ChangeStamp Then if application.AutoLoadPart then o.CleanFields o.unpack rs o.RetriveTime = rtime else o.RowRetrived = False end if End If else if application.AutoLoadPart then o.CleanFields o.unpack rs o.RetriveTime = rtime end if End If mcol.AddItem o, tID mcol2.Remove tID End If o.SecureStyleID = SSID rs.MoveNext wend end if ' rs is nothing For idx = 1 To mcol2.Count Set o = mcol2.Item(idx) o.CloseClass Next Set mcol2 = Nothing End Sub
'Сохранить данные в структуре XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] ParentNode , тип параметра: IXMLDOMElement, '[IN][OUT] Xdom , тип параметра: DomDocument - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLSave({параметры}) Public Sub XMLSave(byref ParentNode as IXMLDOMElement, Xdom as DomDocument) dim o as wpout_pal dim i as long dim pnode as IXMLDOMElement set pnode = xdom.CreateElement("WPOUT_PAL_COL") pnode.setAttribute "IsLocked", m_IsLocked dim node as IXMLDOMElement ParentNode.appendChild pnode for i=1 to count set o = item(i) set node = xdom.CreateElement("WPOUT_PAL") Pnode.appendChild node o.XmlSave node, xdom next End sub
'Загрузить данные из XML 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] NodeList , тип параметра: IXMLDOMnodeList, '[IN] LoadMode , тип параметра: integer=0 - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.XMLLoad({параметры}) Public Sub XMLLoad(byref NodeList as IXMLDOMnodeList, optional byval LoadMode as integer=0) on error resume next dim o as wpout_pal dim node as IXMLDOMElement dim pnode as IXMLDOMElement NodeList.Reset set pnode = NodeList.NextNode m_IsLocked=pnode.Attributes.getNamedItem("IsLocked").nodeValue Set NodeList = pnode.selectNodes("WPOUT_PAL") dim bufcol as collection if loadmode =1 then set bufcol = new collection end if set node = NodeList.NextNode While not node is nothing ' append mode if loadmode =0 then if item(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue) is nothing then Add(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue).xmlload node, loadmode else Item(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue).xmlload node, loadmode end if end if ' replace mode if loadmode =1 then if item(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue) is nothing then Add(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue).xmlload node, loadmode else Item(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue).xmlload node, loadmode end if bufcol.add Item(node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue),node.Attributes.getNamedItem("ID").nodeValue end if ' copy with new ID mode if loadmode =2 then Add().xmlload node, loadmode end if set node = NodeList.NextNode wend ' remove extra items from collection if loadmode =1 then dim i as long ' remove existing removeAgain: for i=1 to count if bufcol.item(item(i).id) is nothing then Delete item(i).id goto removeAgain end if next set bufcol = nothing end if End sub
'может ли быть изменено 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChange public property Get CanChange() as boolean if application.workoffline then CanChange = CanChangeoffLine else CanChange = canchangeonline end if end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме Offline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeOffline public property Get CanChangeOffline() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeOffline end if if not test then test = (IsLocked = LockPermanent) end if CanChangeOffline = test end property
'может ли быть изменено в режиме ONline 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me. CanChangeONLine public property Get CanChangeONLine() as boolean dim test as boolean if not parent is nothing then test = parent.CanChangeONLine end if if not test then test = (IsLocked < ExternalLockSession) end if CanChangeOnline = test end property
'Задать тип блокировки 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newIsLocked , тип параметра: LockStyle - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' value = ...значение... ' me. IsLocked = value friend property Let IsLocked(newIsLocked as LockStyle) m_IsLocked = newIsLocked end property
'Текущий тип блокировки 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса LockStyle ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as LockStyle ' Set variable = me. IsLocked public property Get IsLocked() as LockStyle if m_IsLocked <> LockSession and m_IsLocked <> LockPermanent then CheckLock IsLocked = m_IsLocked end property
'Проверить блокировку 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CheckLock() private sub CheckLock() static LastCheckTime as date if application.WorkOffline then exit sub If Now - LastCheckTime < CDbl(CDate("00:00:10")) Then Exit Sub On Error Resume Next m_IsLocked = Application.MTZSession.IsLocked("wpOut_line", parent.ID) LastCheckTime = now end sub
'Заблокировать 'Parameters: '[IN] Permanent , тип параметра: boolean=false - ... 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.LockResource(...параметры...) public function LockResource(optional byval Permanent as boolean=false ) as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function dim OK ok = Application.MTZSession.LockResource("wpOut_line", parent.id, Permanent) if OK then if Permanent then m_IsLocked = LockPermanent else m_IsLocked = LockSession else m_IsLocked = NoLock end if bye: end function
'Снять блокировку ресурса 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.UnLockResource() public function UnLockResource() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error GoTo bye Application.MTZSession.UnlockResource "wpOut_line", parent.id m_IsLocked = NoLock bye: end function
'Возможно блокирование 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' Boolean, семантика результата: ' true - ' false - 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as boolean ' variable = me.CanLock() public function CanLock() as boolean if application.WorkOffline then exit function On Error Resume Next CanLock = Application.MTZSession.CanLock("wpOut_line",parent.ID) end function
'Настройка грида на вывод раздела 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] YGrid , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.PrepareGrid({параметры}) public sub PrepareGrid(YGrid as object) YGrid.ItemCount = 0 YGrid.Groups.Clear YGrid.SortKeys.Clear YGrid.Columns.Clear YGrid.Columns.Add("Номер по порядку", 0, 0, "sequence").SortType =2 YGrid.Columns.Add("Товар", 0, 0, "theGood").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Кол-во по факту", 0, 0, "QatHand").SortType =2 YGrid.Columns.Add("Единица измерения", 0, 0, "edizm").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Кол-во в штуках", 0, 0, "Q_Quantity").SortType =2 YGrid.Columns.Add("Количество в кг.", 0, 0, "Q_weight").SortType =2 YGrid.Columns.Add("Страна", 0, 0, "TheCountry").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Производитель", 0, 0, "TheDeveloper").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Завод", 0, 0, "TheFactory").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Сертификат", 0, 0, "SertNum").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Дата производства с", 0, 0, "madeDate_from").SortType =4 YGrid.Columns.Add("Дата производства по", 0, 0, "madedate_to").SortType =4 YGrid.Columns.Add("Окончание срока годности", 0, 0, "expdate").SortType =4 YGrid.Columns.Add("Дата окончания хранения", 0, 0, "stopdate").SortType =4 YGrid.Columns.Add("Паллета", 0, 0, "pallet").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Ячейка для остатков", 0, 0, "TheCell").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("С-Аналитика 1", 0, 0, "S1").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("С-Аналитика 2", 0, 0, "S2").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("С-Аналитика 3", 0, 0, "S3").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("С-Аналитика 4", 0, 0, "S4").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("С-Аналитика 5", 0, 0, "S5").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Д-Аналитика 1", 0, 0, "D1").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Д-Аналитика 2", 0, 0, "D2").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Д-Аналитика 3", 0, 0, "D3").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Д-Аналитика 4", 0, 0, "D4").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Д-Аналитика 5", 0, 0, "D5").SortType =1 YGrid.Columns.Add("Брак", 0, 0, "IsBrak").SortType =1 YGrid.ItemCount = count end sub
'Чтение данных строки раздела в грид 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] YGrid , тип параметра: object, '[IN] RowIndex , тип параметра: Long, '[IN] Bookmark , тип параметра: Variant, '[IN][OUT] Values , тип параметра: Variant - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadRow({параметры}) public sub LoadRow(YGrid as object, ByVal RowIndex As Long, ByVal Bookmark As Variant, Values ) dim obj as wpout_pal If RowIndex > 0 And RowIndex <= Count Then 'If not IsEmpty(BookMArk) then ' set obj = item(left(bookmark,38)) 'else set obj = item(rowindex) 'end If if obj is nothing then exit sub on error resume next Values.Value(1) = Left(Replace(obj.sequence, vbCrLf, " "), 255) if obj.theGood is nothing then Values.Value(2) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(2) = Left(Replace(obj.theGood.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if Values.Value(3) = Left(Replace(obj.QatHand, vbCrLf, " "), 255) if obj.edizm is nothing then Values.Value(4) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(4) = Left(Replace(obj.edizm.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if Values.Value(5) = Left(Replace(obj.Q_Quantity, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(6) = Left(Replace(obj.Q_weight, vbCrLf, " "), 255) if obj.TheCountry is nothing then Values.Value(7) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(7) = Left(Replace(obj.TheCountry.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.TheDeveloper is nothing then Values.Value(8) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(8) = Left(Replace(obj.TheDeveloper.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.TheFactory is nothing then Values.Value(9) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(9) = Left(Replace(obj.TheFactory.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if Values.Value(10) = Left(Replace(obj.SertNum, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(11) = Left(Replace(obj.madeDate_from, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(12) = Left(Replace(obj.madedate_to, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(13) = Left(Replace(obj.expdate, vbCrLf, " "), 255) Values.Value(14) = Left(Replace(obj.stopdate, vbCrLf, " "), 255) if obj.pallet is nothing then Values.Value(15) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(15) = Left(Replace(obj.pallet.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.TheCell is nothing then Values.Value(16) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(16) = Left(Replace(obj.TheCell.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.S1 is nothing then Values.Value(17) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(17) = Left(Replace(obj.S1.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.S2 is nothing then Values.Value(18) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(18) = Left(Replace(obj.S2.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.S3 is nothing then Values.Value(19) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(19) = Left(Replace(obj.S3.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.S4 is nothing then Values.Value(20) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(20) = Left(Replace(obj.S4.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.S5 is nothing then Values.Value(21) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(21) = Left(Replace(obj.S5.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.D1 is nothing then Values.Value(22) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(22) = Left(Replace(obj.D1.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.D2 is nothing then Values.Value(23) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(23) = Left(Replace(obj.D2.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.D3 is nothing then Values.Value(24) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(24) = Left(Replace(obj.D3.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.D4 is nothing then Values.Value(25) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(25) = Left(Replace(obj.D4.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.D5 is nothing then Values.Value(26) = "Не задано" else Values.Value(26) = Left(Replace(obj.D5.brief, vbCrLf, " "), 255) end if if obj.IsBrak =-1 then Values.Value(27) = "Да" end if if obj.IsBrak =0 then Values.Value(27) = "Нет" end if YGRID.RowBookmark(RowIndex) = obj.id & "wpout_pal" End If 'RowIndex end sub
'Массовое обновление измененных строк коллекции 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.BatchUpdate() friend sub BatchUpdate() on error goto bye If not Application.WorkOffline Then dim i as long again: for i=1 to count If item(i) Is Nothing Then Exit For If item(i).Deleted Then If Delete(i) Then GoTo again Else on error resume next item(i).BatchUpdate on error goto bye End If next End If bye: End sub
'Загрузка данных из базы 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.LoadAll() friend sub LoadAll() on error goto bye If not Application.WorkOffline Then dim i as long Refresh for i=1 to count item(i).LoadAll next End If bye: End sub

'Название таблицы раздела 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' значение типа string 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as string ' variable = me. PartName public property Get PartName() as string PartName = "wpout_srv" end property
'Задать родительский объект 'Parameters: '[IN][OUT] newParent , тип параметра: object - ... 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim value as Variant ' set value = new Variant ' set me. Parent = value friend property Set Parent(newParent as object) set m_Parent = newParent end property
'Получить родительский объект 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект любого класса Visual Basic ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as object ' Set variable = me. Parent public property Get Parent() as object set Parent = m_Parent end property

Application = value friend property Set Application(newApplication as Application) set m_Application = newApplication m_Application.Logger.Message "wpout_srv.Init" end property
'Корневой объект 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'Returns: ' объект класса Application ' ,или Nothing 'See Also: 'Example: ' dim variable as Application ' Set variable = me. Application public property Get Application() as Application set Application = m_Application end property
'Разрушить иерархическую зависимость объектов 'Parameters: ' параметров нет 'See Also: 'Example: ' call me.CloseParents() private sub CloseParents() set m_Application = nothing set m_Parent = nothing end sub
